 {
    // Vim
    "vim.vimrc.enable": true,
    "vim.vimrc.path": "c:\\Users\\workspace\\.vimrc",
    "vim.leader": " ",
    "vim.useSystemClipboard": true,
    "editor.lineNumbers": "relative",
   
    // FoldLevel
    "vim.foldfix": true,
    "editor.foldingStrategy": "auto",
    "editor.folding": true,

    // PlugIn
    "vim.easymotion": true,
    "vim.surround": true,

    // KeyBind
    "vim.normalModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive": [
        { "before": ["<leader>", "d"], "after": ["\"", "_", "d"] },
        { "before": ["<leader>", "c"], "commands": ["extension.toggleBool"] },   // Need toggle boolean extension 
        { "before": ["<leader>", ";"], "after": ["m", "z", "$", "a", ";", "<Esc>", "`", "z"] },
        { "before": ["m", "m"], "commands": ["bookmarks.toggle"] },     // Need Bookmarks extension
        { "before": ["m", "n"], "commands": ["bookmarks.jumpToNext"] },
        { "before": ["m", "p"], "commands": ["bookmarks.jumpToPrevious"] },
        { "before": ["<C-n>"], "commands": ["editor.action.addSelectionToNextFindMatch"] }
    ],
    "vim.visualModeKeyBindingsNonRecursive": [
        { "before": ["<leader>", "d"], "after": ["\"", "_", "d"] },
        { "before": ["<leader>", "p"], "after": ["\"", "_", "d", "P"] },
        { "before": ["<C-n>"], "commands": ["editor.action.addSelectionToNextFindMatch"] }
    ],
    "vim.insertModeKeyBindings": [
        { "before": ["<C-h>"], "after": ["<Left>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-j>"], "after": ["<Down>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-k>"], "after": ["<Up>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-l>"], "after": ["<Right>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-d>"], "after": ["<BS>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-;>"], "after": ["<Esc>"] },
        { "before": ["<C-t>"], "after": ["<C-o>", "^"] },
        { "before": ["<C-b>"], "after": ["<C-o>", "$"] }
    ],
    "vim.handleKeys": {
        "<C-a>": false, // increment
        "<C-x>": false, // decrement
        "<C-s>": false, // Terminal Stop(NonVi)
        "<C-z>": false, // Go to Shell(NonVi)
        "<C-c>": false, // Cancel
        "<C-v>": false, // vertical visual block
        "<C-f>": false, // scroll up
        "<C-b>": true,  // scroll down(N) -> Don't work : Edit keybindings.json
        "<C-t>": true,  // tags(N), decrease indent(I)
        "<C-d>": true,  // scroll down(N), increase indent(I)
        "<C-r>": true,   // register
    },

    // Intellisence
    "explorer.compactFolders": false,
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "editor.parameterHints.enabled": false,
    "editor.suggest.showConstants": false,
    "editor.suggest.showConstructors": false,
    "editor.suggest.showCustomcolors": false,
    "editor.suggest.showDeprecated": false,
    "editor.suggest.showEnumMembers": false,
    "editor.suggest.showEnums": false,
    "editor.suggest.showEvents": false,
    "editor.suggest.showFields": false,
    "editor.suggest.showFiles": false,
    "editor.suggest.showFolders": false,
    "editor.suggest.showFunctions": false,
    "editor.suggest.showInterfaces": false,
    "editor.suggest.showIssues": false,
    "editor.suggest.showKeywords": false,
    "editor.suggest.showMethods": false,
    "editor.suggest.showModules": false,
    "editor.suggest.showOperators": false,
    "editor.suggest.showProperties": false,
    "editor.suggest.showReferences": false,
    "editor.suggest.showSnippets": false,
    "editor.suggest.showStructs": false,
    "editor.suggest.showTypeParameters": false,
    "editor.suggest.showUnits": false,
    "editor.suggest.showUsers": false,
    "editor.suggest.showValues": false,
    "editor.suggest.showVariables": false,
    "editor.suggest.showWords": false,   
    "editor.suggest.showClasses": false,
    "editor.suggest.showColors": false,
